sentences: This issue was taken up by the COP/MOP in plenary on Wednesday, 9 December.
The Compliance Committee presented the Committee s report (FCCC/KP/CMP/2009/17), highlighting, inter alia , its consideration of two questions of implementation with respect to Croatia.

Croatia expressed disappointment with the decision not to approve its request regarding calculation of its Assigned Amount and commitment period reserve and noted its intention to appeal the decision.
Informal consultations were conducted by Jürgen Lefevere (EU) and the COP/MOP adopted the decision on 18 December.
